benchmark_details.name: PhyGenBench (Physics Generation Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: PhyGenBench is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate physical commonsense correctness in text-to-video generation, comprising 160 prompts across 27 distinct physical laws in various domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the understanding of physical commonsense in text-to-video models and improve video generation capabilities.

data.source: Curated dataset with prompts reflecting physical laws and phenomena.
data.annotation: Manually crafted and validated by experts.

methodology.calculation: Scores are derived based on the alignment of generated videos with prompts and physical laws using a hierarchical evaluation framework.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate the degree to which videos accurately reflect physical phenomena as per human understanding.
methodology.baseline_results: Gen-3 scored 0.51 in physical commonsense alignment.
